Consider this a chance to secure a valuable asset at a competitive price. I understand this is a substantial investment, so please don't hesitate to ask any questions you may have. Let me know your thoughts! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,400,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,400,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
